level.heading: Security requirements for retail service stations.
Legislative History of Law 18-65
level.text: Law 18-65, the "Enhanced Security at Gas Stations Amendment Act of 2009", as introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-95, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 30, 2009, and July 14, 2009, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 28, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 18-161 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-65 became effective on October 22, 2009.
